title: TEST
content:
TEST

 [‹ Fuse Magazine and D&AD](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042235/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39718 "Go to previous forum topic") [Adbusters ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042235/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40006 "Go to next forum topic")
author: ericquenneville

comments.content: Hey man like your site its clean as. If you like san serif I would go for Kris Sowersby’s National [http://www.klim.co.nz/national\_samples.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042235/http:/www.klim.co.nz/national_samples.php) . Its very cool and has a lot of character. I chose to use Gotham from Hoefler and Frere-Jones which I like a lot also I believe my main man Sagmeister uses Gotham for his personal site.

I like it, I like it...

It give’s me a ”friendly, friendly” attitude. And its good.

You know what, I love it.

See, I love this Typophile site, I have worked 10 years with other designers in agencies  
and have been freelancing for 1 years.

I’m gonna tell you that I do miss sharing design with other designers.

Thank you. This is a ”Wow”

But I am still open to other suggestions. Anybody.
Yes National is definitely gonna be my next typeface to purchase. It looks great at all weights and includes smallcaps.
